parameter.name: prettyOutput
parameter.description: If the prettyOutput is specified as 1, will return an indented response of the output.

parameter.name: fields
parameter.description: The array of fileds to be returned in the output.

parameter.name: id
parameter.description: The unique identifier of deal to retrieve it's attached products.

parameter.name: limit
parameter.description: The number of items shown per page.

parameter.name: includeProductData
parameter.description: The includeProductData specifies whether to fetch product data along with each attached product (1) or not (0, default).
